resources.string: No application available for this action!

With updating data all the files on SD Card and internal storage checked again and all the files will be resubmitted to application\'s database so that your newly-created files will be shown in your search results.

The application is now submitting your files in its local database to make searching the faster. This process may last a few minutes. Please during this period don\'t exit the Fast Search (or at least don\'t kill it) and wait. Otherwise the application may missperform! It\'s clear that the more the files are on your device the more the this process takes time. Thanks for your patience.
No application available to open this file!
